The region of the selected workspace. The default value will use the Region selection above.

properties.displayName: Network Session  ASIM parser for Microsoft Sentinel native Network Session table
properties.query:
let parser=(disabled:bool=false) 
{
  ASimNetworkSessionLogs  | where not(disabled)
  | extend
      EventStartTime = TimeGenerated,
      EventEndTime = TimeGenerated,
      EventSchema = "NetworkSession"
  //  -- Aliases
  | extend
      IpAddr=SrcIpAddr,
      Src=SrcIpAddr,
      Dst=DstIpAddr,
      Dvc = coalesce (DvcFQDN, DvcHostname, SrcIpAddr, DvcId),
      Rule = coalesce(NetworkRuleName, tostring(NetworkRuleNumber)),
      Duration = NetworkDuration,
      SessionId = NetworkSessionId,
      User = DstUsername,
      Hostname = DstHostname,
      InnerVlanId = SrcVlanId,
      OuterVlanId = DstVlanId
};
parser (disabled)
